patterns: How do I apply for postgraduate pg scholarships?
What pg postgraduate bursaries are available to me?
responses: We understand that the cost of your studies is one of the most important factors when deciding on a postgraduate degree. That's why we offered over £8 million in postgraduate scholarships last year. Explore your options today

patterns: I would like to know more about swansea university?
What's the history of swansea university?
responses: Founded in 1920, Swansea is a vibrant research-led university. Find out more about the university

patterns: I would like to contact postgraduate admissions team?
Can you provide me the contact details of pg admissions team?
responses: To contact postgraduate admissions team you can call them at +441792295358 or through a live chat

patterns: I would like to contact undergraduate admissions team?
Can you provide me the contact details of ug admissions team?
responses: To contact postgraduate admissions team you can call them at +441792295111 or through a live chat

patterns: I would like to know more about student life?
What's the student life like?
responses: Whether you’re a sports fanatic, culture vulture or outdoor adventurer, you’ll find plenty to keep you busy between lectures. Find out more

patterns: What clubs are available to join?
What societies can i join?
responses: Swansea University has a strong campus-based student community.  From visual arts to poker; real ale to gospel, the Students' Union most likely has the perfect society for you. Find out more

patterns: What's Swansea university doing in promoting arts and culture?
responses: Our mission is championing arts and culture for all, nurturing partnerships, enhancing student experience. Find out more

patterns: I want to know more about library services available?
responses: You can find more about library services

patterns: I want to book a study space at the library?
responses: You can book a study space in the library

patterns: I want to know where can i eat on campus?
responses: Looking for somewhere to curb your caffeine craving or just to grab a sandwich? We have places for you! Find out more

patterns: I want to know how can I reach campus? Available travel options?
responses: As part of our Sustainability and Climate Emergency Strategy, we encourage active travel at Swansea University. Walking or cycling to our campuses is great for your health and wellbeing, and for the environment too. For those who are unable to walk or cycle to campus, we promote public transport as a sustainable and affordable travel option. Find out more

patterns: I want to know what sports facilties and memberships are available?
responses: We pride ourselves on our dedication and commitment to sport and active living for everyone from the beginner to the elite athlete. Find out more

patterns: I want to know what latest events are available?
responses: All the events happening in and around Swansea can be found here

patterns: I want to know what activities apart from academics are available?
responses: Here at Swansea University, we know that university life is more than just study. To get involved, click

patterns: I want to take a virtual tour of the campus?
responses: You can get a virtual tour of the university

patterns: How safe is the university? Safety and security arrangements
responses: Swansea University offers a safe, secure and welcoming experience for students, staff and visitors. Find out more
